duties_responsibilities.duty: Sell software maintenance agreements (SMA’s) to end-users across the Americas territory primarily through outbound and inbound telephone sales activities.
Work with software product specialists to acquire new customers and retain and grow the existing base of customers.
Manage own sales funnel and proactively seek out business opportunities via Marcom or other creative business initiatives.
Communicate deals, issues, and opportunities with relevant specialists.
Interpret customer needs, actively build business opportunities, and represent the company in all sales-oriented activities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors or Masters Degree in a technical field of Chemistry, Biology preferred
